message.body: Are you in our fair state and amazing city yet?! Can't wait to see you!!!!
On the flight! Arriving noonish! Ditto!!!
YAAAAAY!!!
We've arrived!!!
See you tonight!!!!!!
Any timeline in mind?? :) we are trying to organizefor brunch
I can be flexible!
Once people are together and dressed the thought is to congregate at #####...then we have no plans but are open... Pedicure would be nice, I am down for window shopping!
Any desires on your end?
Downtown #######perhaps?
I would definitely vote for ####'s on 9th, and then hanging on 9th and downtown. That would be perfect! Lots to see.
Thanks for looping me in!
No problem! As soon as we have an eta I will text it over...rallying the troops is the tricky part
Great! I actually ate right before you texted, so a little extra time is fine by me.
I think everyone is going to head to brunch if you want to invite ######! :)
Thanks! He's sick, but sends his regrets.
Oh no! I hope he feels better! Too much jello wrestling?
Haha, no...food poisoning :( But we think from Friday night, not last night!!
Oh no! That is the worst!
Yeah. Ick.
Probably heading out in five? #### says takes about 15 minutes?
Okay! I'll fix my bedhead and head over in a bit!
Hurray!!!
I hope you feel better!!! It was great to see you too! Let's not wait so long!
